description.en: Experience how Twinteraction transforms Matterport tours with virtual signage overlays. This technology allows you to add interactive information labels, directional signs, and pop-up content within the virtual space, enhancing navigation and providing additional context to visitors.

historical_context.en: Virtual signage addresses one of the main limitations of standard Matterport tours by adding context-specific information directly within the 3D space. This eliminates the need for separate documentation or guides, creating a more integrated user experience.

en: Custom signage designs can match your brand identity perfectly
Signs can be updated remotely without recreating the entire tour
Interactive signage increases average time spent in virtual tours by 40%
Signs can include clickable URLs, product information, or multimedia content

description.en: See how Twinteraction seamlessly integrates your brand identity into Matterport spaces. From logos and color schemes to custom UI elements, the Branding Room demonstrates how to create a cohesive brand experience in virtual environments.

historical_context.en: Traditional virtual tours often lack brand consistency, appearing generic or disconnected from company identity. Twinteraction's branding capabilities ensure your virtual space maintains the same brand standards as your physical locations and other marketing materials.

en: Branded virtual tours see 35% higher engagement than generic tours
Custom UI elements can include brand-specific animations and interactions
Twinteraction supports dynamic branding that can be updated seasonally
Branding elements can be strategically placed for maximum visibility without disrupting the experience

description.en: Explore how Twinteraction enhances Matterport tours with embedded video content. From product demonstrations to behind-the-scenes footage, this room showcases the power of combining immersive 3D environments with rich video content.

historical_context.en: Twinteraction's video integration capabilities evolved from the need to provide more dynamic content within static 3D spaces. This feature allows businesses to include testimonials, product demonstrations, or promotional content directly within the virtual environment.

en: Videos can be embedded as floating elements or mapped to surfaces like TVs or walls
Twinteraction supports various video sources including YouTube, Vimeo, and custom hosting
Videos can be triggered by proximity or user interaction
Multiple video zones can create a multimedia gallery experience within your tour

description.en: Immerse yourself in the audio capabilities of Twinteraction. This room demonstrates how spatial audio, ambient soundscapes, and triggered sound effects can transform a silent Matterport tour into a rich sensory experience.

historical_context.en: Sound is often overlooked in virtual tours, yet it's crucial for creating immersive experiences. Twinteraction pioneered advanced audio integration for Matterport, allowing for zone-specific sounds, narration, and interactive audio elements that respond to user movement and interactions.

en: Spatial audio creates the illusion of sounds coming from specific locations in the 3D space
Background music can be customized for different areas of your tour
Voice narration can guide visitors through complex spaces or provide educational content
Sound effects can be triggered by user interaction with specific objects or areas

description.en: Witness how Twinteraction brings static spaces to life with animated elements. From subtle environmental effects to interactive product demonstrations, animations add a dynamic layer to your virtual tours that captivate and engage visitors.

historical_context.en: Animations were introduced to address the static nature of traditional 3D scans. Twinteraction developed proprietary technology to integrate lightweight, performance-optimized animations that work across all devices without compromising tour loading speeds.

en: Animated elements can demonstrate how products work or how spaces transform
Environmental animations like rainfall or lighting changes create atmosphere
Interactive animations respond to user clicks or movements
Animation sequences can guide users through a narrative or showcase process flows

description.en: Discover how Twinteraction can transform your Matterport tour into a digital art gallery. This room showcases the integration of high-resolution artwork, interactive exhibits, and digital displays that can be updated remotely without rescanning the space.

historical_context.en: The Digital Artwork feature was originally developed for museums and galleries seeking to create virtual exhibitions. It has since evolved to support retail showrooms, real estate staging, and corporate environments that need flexible display solutions for changing content.

en: Digital artwork can be swapped remotely to create seasonal or themed experiences
Interactive artworks can reveal additional information or transform when clicked
Augmented reality elements can display products or artworks that aren't physically present
Art collections can be curated differently for different visitor demographics

description.en: Learn how Twinteraction converts virtual tour visitors into customers with strategic call-to-action elements. This room demonstrates various ways to integrate purchase options, contact forms, booking systems, and other conversion tools directly within your Matterport tour.

historical_context.en: Traditional virtual tours often failed to convert interest into action. Twinteraction's Call-to-Action features bridge this gap by seamlessly integrating business operations like sales, appointments, or reservations directly into the immersive experience.

en: Strategic CTAs can increase conversion rates by up to 300% compared to standard tours
Integration with e-commerce platforms allows for direct purchasing within the tour
Calendar integrations enable appointment booking without leaving the virtual space
Analytics track which CTAs perform best and where visitors are most likely to convert

description.en: Explore the power of Twinteraction's interactive tagging system. This room showcases how intelligent tags can provide product information, trigger multimedia content, connect to e-commerce systems, and create interactive hotspots throughout your virtual tour.

historical_context.en: Twinteraction's tagging system evolved beyond simple information markers to become a comprehensive interaction layer. The system now supports complex data connections, real-time inventory updates, and personalized content delivery based on user preferences and behavior.

en: Tags can display real-time information like pricing or availability from your database
Interactive product tags can show specifications, variants, and related items
Measurement tags can help visitors understand dimensions and proportions
Tags can be filtered by category, allowing visitors to customize their viewing experience

opening_hours.en: Founded in 2016, Dimensione3 is an innovative technology company specializing in creating enhanced virtual tour experiences. Based in Italy, the company has become a leading Matterport partner, developing Twinteraction - a software solution that transforms standard 3D tours into interactive, branded experiences. Dimensione3 serves clients worldwide, particularly in retail, luxury goods, real estate, and cultural institutions.

en: Twinteraction - Virtual tour enhancement software
IperTwin - Digital twin creation for industrial applications
Tour Meeting - Collaborative virtual tour exploration
Matterport scanning services
3D rendering and tour creation
Custom interactive development
Virtual exhibition design

en.Archiproducts: Archiproducts is a global sourcing platform for architecture and design that connects professionals with product manufacturers. Their physical retail space in Milan, 'Archiproducts Milano,' showcases curated design products in realistic settings. They've partnered with Dimensione3 to create interactive virtual tours of their spaces, allowing global access to their curated environments and products.
